short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Veranderd kleuren en randjes van de tabellen op de website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension "Lesje weg" simply changes the color and borders of the HTML tables and injecting some CSS to do so. 

People should install the extension because it will help them read the content of the tables more clearly.
